name: Vivé Piñata
description:
The other day I realized I hadn't seen any piñata sims for the Vive. Google didn't turn up much of substance so I spent the weekend making this.

Notable features include: geometry slicing (it actually breaks where you hit it) and a low quality fur shader to achieve the "scale" effect.

Pull trigger to grab things. Pull trigger to point and press the reset button.

Also, you can headbutt the piñata.

Donations are appreciated.
